name: Word Tower
description:
WORD TOWER

How to play: Build upon the previous word to make a new word.

There are two alternating tasks:

1. Add one letter to the previous word (example: "SOW" to "SLOW")

2. Change one letter of the previous word (example: "SOW" to "SAW")

Repeat until there are no more valid words that can be made!

Notes

The Scrabble Dictionary is used for word verification which can be found here.

You can use your device keyboard or on-screen keyboard for input. On-screen keyboard was created possible future mobile release and accessibility.
